roleset.name: able to be predicted
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'foresee.01'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: It can be foreseeable that confrontation between the two sides will inevitably occur , but whether the West will directly carry out military intervention or carry out a proxy war is temporarily , still only a kind of strategic speculation .
example.arg: that confrontation between the two sides will inevitably occur
